## dateTimeRangeToSpeech() function

Converts a date time range to speech to be added to a response.

In the case where the date is the same for the start and the end, the date will only be mentioned once. For example "on July 4th 2019 from 1:00 PM to 2:00PM"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function dateTimeRangeToSpeech(value: DateTimeRange, type?: "ssml" | "displayText"): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [DateTimeRange](./stentor-models.datetimerange.md) | DateTimeRange slot value |
|  type | "ssml" \| "displayText" | Optional type, defaults to "ssml". |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
